thread.title: Is Kendrick Lamar Taking Shots At Big Sean On "The Heart Part 4"?
thread.title_full: Is Kendrick Lamar Taking Shots At Big Sean On "The Heart Part 4"?

author: Kevin Goddard
title: Is Kendrick Lamar Taking Shots At Big Sean On "The Heart Part 4"?
text:
Home > Music > Is Kendrick Lamar Taking Shots At Big Sean On "The Heart Part 4"? Is Kendrick Lamar Taking Shots At Big Sean On "The Heart Part 4"? 5 1 1.6K Posted by Kevin Goddard , Mar 24, 2017 at 01:23am Kendrick Lamar is taking shots at somebody on "The Heart Part 4," and twitter think its Big Sean. Kendrick Lamar just sent the internet a blaze Thursday night when he released the fourth installment in â€œThe Heartâ€ series, and while it's pretty certain heâ€™s taking aim at unnamed artist in the second verse, the twittersphere thinks itâ€™s Big Sean . "My fans can't wait for me to son your punk ass and crush your whole lil shit/I'll Big Pun your punk ass you a scared lil bitch/Tip-toeing around my name nigga you lame/When I get at you homie don't just tell me you was just playin'/'I was just playing K.Dot c'mon you know a nigga rock with you bro'/Shut the fuck up you sound like the last nigga I know/Might end up like the last nigga I know/Oh you don't want to clash? Yeah nigga I knowâ€ Kendrick raps. Later on, K. Dot even says, â€œHoe, Jay Z Hall of Fame, sit ya punk ass down,â€ which some think could be a reference to Big Seanâ€™s second album Hall of Fame . Now this is all speculation at the moment, but people also thought that Sean took a couple jabs at K.Dot in his verse on â€œNo More Interviewsâ€ last year, rapping â€œAnd I canâ€™t lie like I like this shit like I usually do / And Iâ€™m just not impressed by you niggas rapping fast / Who sound like one big asthma attack but trash when Iâ€™m rapping it back / Who you put in your top five and claim they the savior of rap.â€ As Complex points, K. Dot also uses the word â€œlilâ€ a couple times throughout the track, and also claims to "Big Pun your punk ass," which could be a flip on Big Sean's name. For what itâ€™s worth, some people think K Dot could be going at Drake too, but the lyrics & evidence looks to be aiming at Bg Sean. But then again, maybe we're reading in between the lines too closely? Take a listen to the record for yourself right here & let us know if you hear the Big Sean-shots. (Below, is twitter's quick reaction to the possible-diss)
